text: Avvakumovo () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Avvakumovskoye Rural Settlement of Kalininsky District, Tver Oblast, Russia. The population was 1284 as of 2017. There are 27 streets. == Geography == The village is located north-east from Tver. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tver Oblast
title: Avvakumovo
